children.customFusionChartConfig:
{
  "type": "area2d",
  "dataSource": {
    "data": {{RenewalRates.data.map( (row) => {
      return { label: row.year, value: row.renewal_rate }});}},
    "chart": {
      "caption": "First Year Renewal Rates",
      "yAxisName": "Renewed(%)",
			"theme": "fusion",
			"paletteColors": "#6cbf83",
			"baseFont": "Roboto, sans-serif",
			"baseFontSize": "12",
			"baseFontColor": "#4d4d4d",
			"captionFont": "Roboto, sans-serif",
			"captionFontSize": "24",
			"subCaptionFont": "Roboto, sans-serif",
			"subCaptionFontSize": "18",
			"subCaptionFontColor": "#868e96",
			"labelDisplay": "rotate",
      "slantLabel": "1",
			"labelFontSize": "12",
			"labelFontColor": "#888",
			"numbersuffix": "%",
			"anchorBgHoverColor": "#6cbf83",
			"anchorHoverRadius": "7"
    }
  }
}

{
  "type": "line",
  "dataSource": {
    "data": {{RenewalRatesbyMonth.data.map( (row) => {
      return { label: row.month_of_purchase, value: row.average_renewal_rate }});}},
    "chart": {
      "caption": "Renewal Rate by Month",
      "yAxisName": "Renewed(%)",
			"theme": "fusion",
			"paletteColors": "#6cbf83",
			"baseFont": "Roboto, sans-serif",
			"baseFontSize": "12",
			"baseFontColor": "#4d4d4d",
			"captionFont": "Roboto, sans-serif",
			"captionFontSize": "24",
			"subCaptionFont": "Roboto, sans-serif",
			"subCaptionFontSize": "18",
			"subCaptionFontColor": "#868e96",
			"labelDisplay": "rotate",
      "slantLabel": "1",
			"labelFontSize": "12",
			"labelFontColor": "#888",
			"numbersuffix": "%",
			"anchorBgColor": "#6cbf83",
			"anchorBgHoverColor": "#6cbf83",
			"anchorHoverRadius": "7"
    }
  }
}
